channel.name: Arirang World KR
channel.title: AFTER SCHOOL CLUB[R]
channel.desc: Tired of one-way K-pop? Join the Club! After School Club is the Live Music Request show for K-Pop fans all around the world. On our weekly live show, you can join our video chat sessions through Google Hangouts, send us tweets, and share status.Connect directly with AARON, ALLEN, TAEYOUNG, as well as our awesome guests!

channel.name: Arirang World KR
channel.title: WITH SCIENCE, WE LIVE
channel.desc: Humanity has learned from the past, transcended the present, and dreamed of the future.\"With Science, We Live\"explores the frontiers of science alongside some of the world?s leading thinkers, offering insights into what lies ahead and uncovering new possibilities.In an era of rapid change, where are we headed?As we navigate between the vast universe and the smallness of human existence, we reconsider the direction we must take.Now, in this very moment, we imagine the future shaped by our choices?and move forward toward it.

channel.name: Arirang World KR
channel.title: PREMIUM COLLECTION B
channel.desc: Arirang TV's premium documentary series, Premium Collection? VOD service is currently not available due to copyright issues.

channel.name: Arirang World KR
channel.title: NEWSCENTER [L] (30?)
channel.desc: Watch the Latest Stories Here: Arirang's Primetime News Center (Weekdays 8 PM KST).

channel.name: Arirang World KR
channel.title: WITHIN THE FRAME [L]
channel.desc: Ranging from politics, economy, foreign policy and culture, \"Within the Frame\" is a daily in-depth analysis show, delving deeper into different topics every day.With a panel of experts, \"Within the Frame\" will delve deeper into the headlines of the week, providing for premium news analysis in an easy, well-trimmed manner. Tune into \"Within the Frame.\".

channel.name: Arirang World KR
channel.title: THE KULTURE WAVE [R]
channel.desc: Riding on the Korean Wave! A culture news program that explores K-culture from all aspects with a variety of panelists and guests. Stay up to date on K-entertainment, K-trends, K-people, K-everything with \"the Kulture Wave\"!The Kulture Wave?Daily 14:00-14:30(KST). Kwon Soa.

channel.name: Arirang World KR
channel.title: 1DAY 1K-CULTURE: K-PEOPLE
channel.desc: The emergence of the word ?K-Brand? indicates the level of worldwide interest in Korean culture today. [1Day 1K-culture] is a daily series of cultural programs designed to bring viewers closer to the everyday cultures of Korea. K-Trend What's popular in Korea K-People Like and follow, Koreans of interest K-Story What Koreans are viewing now K-Stage Must-see performances.

channel.name: Arirang World KR
channel.title: DISCOVERING KOREA: FOOD
channel.desc: ?Discovering Korea? is a travel information program that delivers specific tourism information about Korean destinations including food, attractions and scenery etc. Throughout this program, it promotes Korean culture and conducts global tourism marketing promotion.

channel.name: Arirang World KR
channel.title: DIPLOMAT'S ARCHIVE: HIDDEN STORIES
channel.desc: As of April 2025, S. Korea has established diplomatic relations with a total of 194 countries. Among them are countries that have had ties and exchanges with Korea for hundreds of years. With such long-standing relationships with so many nations, might there be fascinating hidden stories between Korea and the rest of the world that we don?t know yet? \"Diplomat?s Archives: Hidden Stories\" begins with this very question. Together with foreign embassies in Korea, the series uncovers and sheds light on meaningful yet lesser-known stories between Korea and other countries. Through this, we aim to reaffirm the deep friendships that have been built over time, highlight how countries are interconnected?bilaterally and multilaterally? and emphasize the importance of cooperation on the global stage today.

channel.name: Arirang World KR
channel.title: THE GRAND HERITAGE K-ASMR
channel.desc: Cultural Heritage storyThe Grand Heritage presents the historical value and hidden stories of Korea's world-famous cultural heritage in an aesthetic format helping our global viewers get a better understanding of Korea's cultural assets.? VOD service is currently not available due to copyright issues.
